catch_copy:
Forced to change jobs from fortune teller to exorcist!?
A fake fortune teller with zero spiritual sense continues investigating the academy today...
description:
◆Story
A famous fortune teller by the name of "Galaxias Kamiki".
He wakes up and finds himself in an unknown room.

Although Kamiki thought this was part of a TV show prank...
A man known as the chairman of Yoko Girls' Academy appears before him...

"I had you quit the talent agency so that you could exorcise the Princess of the Clock Tower."
"... What is going on!?!?"
Before the overwhelming power and wealth of the chairman, Kamiki was left with no choice but to become both an exorcist and a counselor.

In reality, Kamiki was a fortune teller with no spiritual sense to begin with...
To make matters worse, he wasn't even a real fortune teller...!

Will Galaxias Kamiki really be able to exorcise the rumored "Princess of the Clock Tower"?


◆Characters
・Mirei Ryugasaki
The daughter of Yoko Girls' Academy's chairman, she possesses stunning looks unmatched by anyone else.
She was voted #1 in the school's popularity contest and is referred to as one of the "Three Holy Maidens".
In reality, she is extremely lonely, but she never lowers her conceited attitude.

・Erina Mitsutsuji
A bright and cheerful young girl who doesn’t judge people by their social status or bloodline.
Known as one of the "Three Holy Maidens" for her stunning beauty, she is extremely popular among her juniors.
Because Erina's father is a successful entrepreneur, people often gossip about her wealth behind her back.

・Chieri Takamiya
One of the "Three Holy Maidens," she has a quiet personality and struggles to express her thoughts.
She is good friends with Erina, and often spends more time with her than with Mirei.
She has an extraordinary spiritual sense, and it is often said that her fortune-telling is incredibly accurate.

・Nogi Koji
The protagonist known as "Galaxias Kamiki".
Although his identity was quickly exposed by the chairman, his real name remains a top secret.
He has been tasked with finding the "Princess of the Clock Tower"...
formal_name: Ghost of Boarding School お嬢様学院のインチキ占い師
network_feature_description:
This software supports the following:
- Touch screen
